org.slf4j.impl

Class StaticLoggerBinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.slf4j.impl.StaticLoggerBinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoggerContextSelectorProvider, LoggerFactoryBinder

    public class StaticLoggerBinder
extends Object
implements LoggerFactoryBinder, LoggerContextSelectorProvider
    The binding of LoggerFactory class with an actual instance of ILoggerFactory is performed using information returned by this class. Modified for use in Red5.
    Author:
    Ceki Gülcü, Paul Gregoire

      Fields

      static String REQUESTED_API_VERSION
      Declare the version of the SLF4J API this implementation is compiled against.

      • REQUESTED_API_VERSION

        public static String REQUESTED_API_VERSION
        Declare the version of the SLF4J API this implementation is compiled against. The value of this field is usually modified with each release.
